short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A suite of modules that enhance your Hacker News browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An open source, unofficial extension to make reading Hacker News a little nicer.

Navigate up and down links with the keyboard, and open comments and links with the touch of a key.  You can also interact with comments and links by voting and replying all without ever needing a mouse :).

Also, you can optionally enable "Dark Mode" under the Hacker News Suite menu.
